vfs_both_paths.note: Profile mentions both alias and canonical forms; all requests allowed; control confirming canonical behavior.

vfs_private_tmp_only.note: Profile mentions only canonical /private/... paths; alias and canonical requests are allowed across the path set; literal on canonical path effective for both.

vfs_tmp_only.note: Profile mentions only /tmp/* paths; alias and canonical requests are denied across the path set, consistent with canonicalization-before-enforcement with only /private/... literals effective.
